content: स्नानं [स्ना-भावे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Bathing, washing, ablution, immersion in water; ततः प्रविशति स्नानोत्तीर्णः काश्यपः <ls>Ś. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Purification by bathing, any religious or ceremonial ablution. {@--3@} The ceremony of bathing or anointing an idol. {@--4@} Anything used in ablution.
